q5.question: How did Jonathan locate the place of his wife's death?
q5.answer: ["Jonathan locates the site of his wife's death by following signs on recordings"]
q5.recall: Jonathan located the place of his wife's death after he heard her voice on his radio and she advised him to leave and bring her to three presences. He was shown the place before the three strange presences appeared and he phoned Detective Smits to tell him of the place, but he didn't seem to understand. At the derelict place, Jonathan arrived to see many screens and monitors on.
q5.vectordb: Jonathan located the place of his wife's death by following the images he saw on his screens and monitors. He arrived at a derelict place where he saw many screens and monitors on, and a man lurking in the shadows behind him. Anna's image advised him to leave, but he stayed and saw what looked like the torture tools of a psychopath, who was waiting for him while Mary was tied down. The three presences were present. The psycho was the worker who got Jonathan and the contractor from the lift. He said that the three presences had asked him to bring Anna to them as well. Smits and other police officers arrived after Jonathan had fallen down three or four storeys and was dead. Mike and Sarah went to the funeral.
q5.hybrid: Jonathan located the place of his wife's death after he heard her voice on his radio and she advised him to leave and bring her to three presences. He was shown the place before the three strange presences appeared and he phoned Detective Smits to tell him of the place, but he didn't seem to understand. At the derelict place, Jonathan arrived to see many screens and monitors on.
